title: Customized Learning Style Diagnosis and Application Strategies for English Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English proficiency and foundational understanding of learning theories
context.additional_context: English learning environment for science majors requiring specialized terminology and logical reasoning.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose their perceptual learning styles (visual/auditory/tactile) and cognitive preferences (analytical/creative)
Learners can establish and implement personalized scientific paper reading strategies based on diagnostic results
Learners can recognize peers' learning style differences and design collaboration strategies during small-group activities

resources: Wintergerst & De Capua Revised LSI Questionnaire
Science Field English Research Paper Samples
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
